Detailed Description

Class FirstLayerCellVariableFillPattern is a concrete implementation of the abstract base class VariableFillPattern.

It is used to calculate overlaps according to a pattern which limits the overlaps to the cell-centered ghost region of width 1 surrounding a patch, including all edges and corners.

Member Function Documentation

boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxOverlap > SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerCellVariableFillPattern::calculateOverlap ( const hier::BoxGeometry &  dst_geometry,
const hier::BoxGeometry &  src_geometry,
const hier::Box &  dst_patch_box,
const hier::Box &  src_mask,
const hier::Box &  fill_box,
const bool  overwrite_interior,
const hier::Transformation &  transformation 
) const [virtual]

Calculate overlap between the destination and source geometries according to the fill pattern.

This will return the portion of the intersection of the geometries that lies in the ghost region of width 1 surrounding the patch. The patch is identified by the argument dst_patch_box.

Parameters:
[in] dst_geometry geometry object for destination box
[in] src_geometry geometry object for source box
[in] dst_patch_box box for the destination patch
[in] src_mask the source mask, the box resulting from transforming the source box
[in] fill_box the box to be filled
[in] overwrite_interior controls whether or not to include the destination box interior in the overlap. This has no effect in this implementation, since all calculated overlaps will be on the destination box exterior.
[in] transformation the transformation from source to destination index space.
Returns:
boost::shared_ptr to the calculated overlap object
Precondition:
dst_patch_box.getDim() == src_mask.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::VariableFillPattern.

boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxOverlap > SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerCellVariableFillPattern::computeFillBoxesOverlap ( const hier::BoxContainer &  fill_boxes,
const hier::Box &  patch_box,
const hier::Box &  data_box,
const hier::PatchDataFactory &  pdf 
) const [virtual]

Computes a BoxOverlap object which defines the space to be filled by a refinement operation.

For this implementation, that space is the intersection between fill_boxes (computed by the RefineSchedule), data_box, which specifies the extent of the destination data, and the first-layer ghost region that defines the stencil of this fill pattern.

Parameters:
[in] fill_boxes list representing the all of the space on a patch or its ghost region that may be filled by a refine operator (cell-centered represtentation)
[in] patch_box box representing the patch where a refine operator will fill data. (cell-centered representation)
[in] data_box box representing the full extent of the region covered by a patch data object, including all ghosts (cell-centered representation)
[in] pdf patch data factory for the data that is to be filled

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::VariableFillPattern.
